SEARCH
Module com.example.dicerollerproject
Package com.example.dicerollerproject

Class ProfileController

java.lang.Object
com.example.dicerollerproject.ProfileController
public class ProfileController extends Object
The ProfileController class manages the user's profile page. It allows users to view and update their custom dice rolls, log out, and navigate back to the main page.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProfileController

      public ProfileController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the profile controller by loading custom rolls for the logged-in user. This method is automatically called when the profile page is loaded.

    • populateUserData

      public void populateUserData()
      Populates the profile page with user data, specifically displaying the username. This method is called when the profile page is loaded to show the logged-in user's name.

    • showLoggedinUser

      public void showLoggedinUser(String username)
      Displays the logged-in user's username with a welcome message.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the logged-in user.

    • loadCustomRolls

      public void loadCustomRolls()
      Loads custom dice rolls for the logged-in user and displays them in the ListView. The list is cleared before adding the new rolls to ensure there are no duplicates.

    • saveCustomRollClick

      public void saveCustomRollClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Saves a new custom dice roll when the "Save" button is clicked. It checks that both the roll name and roll formula are not empty before saving.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the save button click.

    • closeHistoryWindow

      public void closeHistoryWindow(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Closes the profile window when the close button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the close button click.

    • logout

      public void logout(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Logs the user out by clearing their session and hiding the profile window.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the logout button click.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while logging out or closing the window.
